scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross. To his left stands the Virgin Mary, draped in a blue mantle and with her hands clasped in prayer. To his right is Saint John the Evangelist, also with hands clasped in prayer, wearing a blue tunic and a red mantle. The background features a patterned textile and a blue sky with celestial bodies, including a sun and a moon. The ground is depicted as green and rocky.
